attributes.action: Close the airports or provide security staff atleast a mask.
attributes.additional_details: As government have said we all should follow the social distancing and for security officers it's not possible. We are putting ourselves and our families at risk.
attributes.background: Close the airport as social distance is not possible out there. Or provide mask to security officers for there safety and there family

rejection.details:
We have published a petition calling on the Government to close down all UK airports and seaports to prevent further spreading of Covid-19, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300932

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
